Action.author: joe-alewine
Action.body: Hi, Yoav. Is there a basic idea of what kind of documentation this will be/need? Is there a design doc for the revised design?

Action.author: tock
Action.body: ~joe-alewine Hi Joe, I added a design doc. Check if it fits your needs for producing user facing documentation.

Action.author: tock
Action.body: ~joe-alewine , does the current documentation|https://docs.google.com/document/d/1I7zWBomEPsgxgDYiYwE7ZPaT_Htll996nM2Y5A4xY-8/edit#heading=h.lq5yb4vsi0bo meet you needs for producing user facing documentation? please reach out to me if you need anything additional to this.

Action.author: guoger
Action.body: merged in master and i believe this should be cherry-picked to 1.4 branch? ~joe-alewine
